short_summary: Acquisition, delivery and installation of metal lockers to Montreal. Fulfill required by 22 December 2022.
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 22, 2022.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Title (English)/Titre de l'Appel d'Offres (Français):** EF245-231530 Metal Lockers Non-SA for DND Montreal / Casiers Métal Hors AMA pour MDN Montréal
* **Reference Number (English)/Renseignements Prepared By the Solicitor (Français):** WS3777673733-Doc3779294525
* **Amendment Number (English)/Numéro de Modification (Français):** 3
* **Publication Date (English)/Date de Publication (Français):** 2022-12-07
* **Tender Closing Date (English)/Appel d'Offres Date de Clôture (Français):** 2022-12-22T14:00:00

### Contract Requirements

* **Acquisition/Projet:** The Canadian Government's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of 83 metal lockers to be installed at the DND Montreal facility.
* **Scope of Work/Champs de Travail:** The successful bidder will be required to deliver and install 83 metal lockers, in accordance with specifications outlined in Annex A.

### Selection Criteria

* **Evaluation Criteria/Évaluation des Offres:** The lowest price will be the primary selection criterion, in accordance with CBC RFP Guidelines.

### Submissions

* **Deadline for Submissions/Délai de Soumission:** All submissions must be received by 2 PM EST on December 22, 2022.
* **Notice URL/URL de l'avis de consultation des documents:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14839151?extsite=MTQ4MzkxNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14839151?extsite=MTQ4MzkxNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person/Personne-ressource:** Julie Carbonneau (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email/Adresse e-mail:** julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
